description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 37800/APP/2024/744, dated 23-04-2024 (Non-material amendment to amend condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref. 37800/APP/2022/1878, dated 04-08-2022 for The removal and replacement of 1 no. existing antenna with 1 no. upgraded antenna, the removal and replacement of 1 no. BTS3900A cabinet with 2 no. S-Airo cabinets, the installation of 1 no. GPS unit affixed to a support pole and ancillary development thereto. Amendments seek to replace a wall-mounted support pole with a freestanding support frame to support one relocated antenna and one replacement antenna.) to revert back to original permission under app ref.37800/APP/2022/1878.
decision_conditions: Condition 2 of planning permission reference 37800/APP/2022/1878, dated 04-08-2022, is amended to:

The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans: 5G and Future Technology - Delivering the UK's Telecoms Future, Article 13 Notice, CAA Letter, Digital Infrastructure, ICNIRP Declaration, IET Guide to 5G, Declaration of Conformity with International Commission on Non-Ionizing Radiation Protection Public Exposure Guidelines received 10/06/2022, and the following drawings/details submitted under this non-material amendment application:
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of The London Plan (2021).and Hillingdon Council's Local Pl

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Conditions 2, which is superseded by the above conditions, all other conditions relating to planning permission reference 37800/APP/2022/1878, dated 04-08-2022, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been superseded:

914594_HGN019_60824_UB0152_M004-Rev-C1 (200 PROPOSED SITE PLAN); 914594_HGN019_60824_UB0152_M004-Rev-C1 (250 PROPOSED SITE ELEVATION A); 914594_HGN019_60824_UB0152_M004-Rev-C1 (251 PROPOSED SITE ELEVATION B); 914594_HGN019_60824_UB0152_M004-Rev-C1 (300 EQUIPMENT LAYOUT).
